Posts.EditableText: Hi! I've browsed the forum and it looks like you can only have your account deleted via request? Weird that we can't delete our own account tbh. Anyway, please delete! Thanks!

Posts.EditableText:
Hello.

I think you have to use the main "Contact us" thingy and ask for your account to be deleted.

http://textadventures.co.uk/help/contact
